oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Summary of the Proposed Charter for the Consolidated Government of Clarksville and Montgomery County, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The 1980 Charter Commission established the basic structure of the proposed consolidated government for Clarksville-Montgomery County. This document highlighted the broader points of the Proposed Charter. Page 5 was not included in the collection, and it's unclear if this is a misprint or if page 5 is unaccounted for.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Executive departments--Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
